entities.name: harry potter
entities.description: The main character's name is mentioned in the text, but it is not explicitly stated that he is present at this moment.

entities.name: dudley dursley
entities.description: Dudley is Mr. Dursley's son and is described as having a tantrum.

entities.name: mr dursley
entities.description: Mr. Dursley is the father of Dudley and is described as leaving for work.

entities.name: mrs dursley
entities.description: Mrs. Dursley is Mr. Dursley's wife and is mentioned as being pecked on the cheek by her husband.

relationships.description: Mr. Dursley pecked Mrs. Dursley on the cheek.
Mr. Dursley tried to kiss Dudley goodbye but missed.
